column2: My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetBestName] has managed to overcome [From.GetHerHis] at times excessive drinking through hard work and dedication. Perhaps I should attempt to follow in [From.GetHerHis] footsteps?
I should attempt to drink less...
I think not!

My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetBestName] has managed to overcome [From.GetHerHis] well-known hedonism through hard work and dedication. Perhaps I should attempt to follow in [From.GetHerHis] footsteps?
No more hedonism!
I think not!

My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetBestName] has managed to overcome [From.GetHerHis] at times overly lustful nature through hard work and dedication. Perhaps I should attempt to follow in [From.GetHerHis] footsteps?
Perhaps I am too lustful...
I think not!

My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetBestName] has managed to overcome [From.GetHerHis] at times unparalleled cruelty through hard work and dedication. Perhaps I should attempt to follow in [From.GetHerHis] footsteps?
I might be overly cruel at times...
I think not!

My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetBestName] has managed to overcome [From.GetHerHis] at times concerning gluttony through hard work and dedication. Perhaps I should attempt to follow in [From.GetHerHis] footsteps?
I could maybe eat a bit less...
I think not!

My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetBestName] has managed to overcome [From.GetHerHis] at times troubling greed through hard work and dedication. Perhaps I should attempt to follow in [From.GetHerHis] footsteps?
My greed might be a problem...
I think not!

My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetBestName] has managed to overcome [From.GetHerHis] at times worrisome envy through hard work and dedication. Perhaps I should attempt to follow in [From.GetHerHis] footsteps?
Perhaps I could be kinder...
I think not!

My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetBestName] has managed to overcome [From.GetHerHis] at times unspeakable anger through hard work and dedication. Perhaps I should attempt to follow in [From.GetHerHis] footsteps?
Perhaps I should try to be more patient...
I think not!

My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetBestName] has managed to overcome [From.GetHerHis] at times overly abundant pride through hard work and dedication. Perhaps I should attempt to follow in [From.GetHerHis] footsteps?
I might be too prideful...
I think not!

My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetBestName] has managed to overcome [From.GetHerHis] at times concerningly fearful nature through hard work and dedication. Perhaps I should attempt to follow in [From.GetHerHis] footsteps?
I should try to be braver...
Maybe I could trust people a bit more...
I think not!
